error.message: Class Drupal\learnosity\Event\LearnosityEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Call to deprecated constant REQUEST_TIME: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::time()->getRequestTime();
Call to deprecated constant REQUEST_TIME: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::time()->getRequestTime();
Missing explicit access check on entity query.

The 'learnosity' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256

The 'learnosity.authorapi' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256

The 'image_upload' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.9 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.9 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal. Either remove it or update it to be compatible. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
